page.home.title: Take control of your password with LibrePass
page.home.description: Convenience and security can be combined. Your passwords are secure and can easily be accessed so your online life is easy and secure.
page.home.section.first.p: Convenience and security go hand in hand. Your passwords are secure and you have easy access to them.
page.home.section.second.badges.secure.p: Your passwords are end-to-end encrypted and securely stored
page.home.section.second.badges.accessib: Available on all your favorite platforms
page.login.title: Log in
page.login.description: Log in on your LibrePass account to manage your vault.
page.register.title: Create account
page.register.description: Create an account with LibrePass to start creating secure passwords for your accounts, which will be stored securely.
page.register.field.alt.email: Your e-mail address will never be shared with with anyone. There is no spam.
page.register.field.alt.password_normal: Your forgotten password cannot be recovered! 8 characters required.
page.register.field.alt.password_hint: A password hint can help you remember.
page.verification_email.title: Verification of e-mail address
